Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 23 Jan 2019You put a deposit.They give you a margin multiplied by your deposit. Some margin accounts are low like 2 times, some can be insanely high 400x of your deposit capital.With margin you can of course buy more than you can with just deposited capital. Every time you make use of the margin, you will be charged interest because you are technically borrowing money.0 comments0
